attributes.action: introduce a ten tier jail system.. number one for absolutely no hopers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if there was a 10 tier jail system tier 10 would be for people with minor offences such as none payment of rates etc or first time offenders could just attend an open type prison for so many hours a day. if they did'nt attend increase the hours to a maximum of ten hours per day.this would be about tier 7. tier 6 to 4 would be for persistant offenders or more serious crimes and would be served in proper jails. tiers 3 and 2 would be for murderers and rapists etc with no soft options (tvs recreational facilities etc) in tier 2 and finaly tier 1 would be for the lowest of the low the fred wests and peter sutcliffes etc.. just lock them up with no benefits whatsoever in the most secure units ,without visitors ,or any chance of ever getting out
